turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Thank you for calling Pikl Insurance, this is Sarah. How can I help you today?

turns.speaker: customer
turns.text: Hi Sarah, I need to file a claim for a car accident that happened yesterday. How do I do that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: I'm sorry to hear about your accident. I can definitely help you with that. You can file a claim online through our customer portal, or I can help you start the process right now over the phone. Which would you prefer?

turns.speaker: customer
turns.text: I'd like to do it now if that's okay. Also, I'm not sure if my policy covers rental cars while mine is being repaired. Does it?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Let me pull up your policy... Yes, I can see that you have rental car coverage with a limit of $30 per day for up to 30 days while your vehicle is being repaired. That's part of your comprehensive coverage.

turns.speaker: customer
turns.text: Great! And how long does the claims process usually take?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: Once we receive all the necessary documentation, we typically process claims within 5-7 business days. However, if we need additional information or an adjuster needs to inspect the vehicle, it may take a bit longer. I'll make sure to keep you updated throughout the process.

turns.speaker: customer
turns.text: Okay, that sounds good. What documents do I need to provide?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.text: You'll need to provide photos of the damage, a copy of the police report if one was filed, and contact information for any other parties involved. You can upload these directly to your claim once it's created.
